titleStmt.title: A. catalogue of all the cheifest [sic] rarities in the publick theater and anatomie-hall of the University of Leiden, vvhich are soe set in order that all may easily bee found in their places.
titleStmt.author: Rijksuniversiteit te Leiden. Anatomisch Kabinet.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Maarten van Leeuwen, in the Keetelboeter-steeg.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Sutro Library.
